CustomField.formula: CASE(Level__c, 2, Name + ' ' + TEXT(Year__c), 3, Name + ': ' + CASE (TEXT(Month__c), '1','JANUARY', '2','FEBRUARY', '3','MARCH', '4','APRIL', '5','MAY', '6','JUNE', '7','JULY', '8','AUGUST', '9','SEPTEMBER', '10','OCTOBER', '11','NOVEMBER', '12','DECEMBER', 'N/A')+ ' ' + TEXT(Year__c), Name )
CustomField.label: HeaderName
